Text:
I WOULD start to upload the second of the two classics they show every weekend, so people here can enjoy two classics, however, our stupid local ABC station has been abruptly cutting the program off short so we only get to see a few seconds of the post-interviews (and sometimes they cut off even MORE).

This has really annoyed me, but maybe people won't care so much, and I may re-consider.
****FYI NO NEW EPISODE UPDATES UNTIL FRIDAY****
